posts.post_content:
Posted By: Peter Baldes
Hello,

I'm selling half of my paltry Old Judge collection.
These are definitely beaters. Here are the players:

Foster, N.Y.: Corner dented, writing on back, has backing
Curtis, St. Joes: No backing, just the thin photo, no Old Judge ad
Bryan, Chicago: Photo pasted on thin cardboard, no Old Judge ad

Selling all three for $115 postpaid with insurance.

Thanks!
Peter Baldes
square5000 on ebay
sunology@netzero.net

Thank you Peter, Mr. Foster has arrived...Joe
